text: Amritchandra (f. 10th-century CE) was a Digambara Jain Acharya who wrote commentaries on Samayasāra called Atmakhyati and Samaysar Kalasha, Pravachanasara and Pancastikayasara. He also wrote independent books of Puruşārthasiddhyupāya and Tattvartha Sara. He wrote in Sanskrit language. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Sources=== * * Category:10th-century people Category:Sanskrit scholars Category:Jain acharyas Category:Year of death unknown
title: Amritchandra
